segments.text: Good morning , Miss Cai . Congratulations ! You ’ Ve passed the interview .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good morning , Mr . Yang . Thank you very much . Can I work now ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh . Take it easy . As I ’ Ve said in the interview , once you are employed , we ’ ll give you a probation period of three months . And now we need to sign a draft agreement for the probation period .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am sorry , I am just too excited and forget it . Can I look it through ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course , here you are . And you can ask me any question .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I am sorry that I have a question . There is no remuneration item in this agreement . Can you tell me something about it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , according to the principle of our company , employees like you have no remuneration during the probation period .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But you didn ’ t tell me in the interview .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am sorry , it ’ s not decided by me but by the company .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay , I can ’ t decide whether sign or not now . Can you give me some time to think it over ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay . Can you give me a reply tomorrow ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Thank you very much . Mr . Yang .
segments.speaker: S2
